sources.tweet:
MTG is afraid to debate me because she sees our momentum.

As we're getting closer to filing the final FEC report, it's crucial that we keep up our momentum.

Pls retweet and consider matching our avg. donation of $28.49 or chip in any amount to fire MTG.https://t.co/xxy5BGTV2M

WATCH:

Don Westlake is a lifelong Republican, and I'm honored to have his support. We don't agree on everything, but we share a mutual love for agriculture.

People like Don are why we're going to beat MTG. Listen to him why he's crossing party lines to support me over MTG. https://t.co/5MFtsFISkr

I'm Shawn Harris, a retired Brigadier General, and I'm a Democrat running against Marjorie Taylor Greene.

I served in the military for 40 years, fighting for our nation and its democracy.

I'm now stepping up to fight for our democracy once again by getting rid of MTG. https://t.co/WZwMRjcWzB

Unlike MTG, my priority will be the people of North Georgia, not headlines.

Unlike MTG, I'm going to work together, not against my colleagues.

Unlike MTG, I won't insult people or other groups every other day.

Unlike MTG, I'll honor our flag and fight to defend our democracy.

MTG IS LOSING MOMENTUM!

It's crucial that we keep up our momentum as we approach the final FEC deadline at the end of the month.

Can you retweet and chip in $7, $14, $24, 50, or whatever you can afford right now to flip GA14 and end MTG's toxic career?https://t.co/nwUCLU30a9
